verses.verse: "You shall not bear <WH5375> a false <WH7723> report; <WH8088> do not join <WH7896> your hand <WH3027> with a wicked <WH7563> man <WH7563> to be a malicious <WH2555> witness. <WH5707>

"You shall not follow <WH1961> <WH310> a multitude <WH7227> in doing evil, <WH9567> nor <WH3808> shall you testify <WH6030> in a dispute <WH7379> so as to turn <WH5186> aside <WH5186> after <WH310> a multitude <WH7227> in order to pervert <WH5186> [justice;]
nor <WH3808> shall you be partial <WH1921> to a poor <WH1800> man <WH1800> in his dispute. <WH7379>
"If <WH3588> you meet <WH6293> your enemy's ox <WH7794> or <WH176> his donkey <WH2543> wandering <WH8582> away, <WH8582> you shall surely <WH7725> return <WH7725> it to him.

"If <WH3588> you see <WH7200> the donkey <WH2543> of one who hates <WH8130> you lying <WH7257> [helpless] under <WH8478> its load, <WH4853> you shall refrain <WH2308> from leaving <WH5800> it to him, you shall surely <WH5800> release <WH5800> [it] with him.
"You shall not pervert <WH5186> the justice <WH4941> [due] to your needy <WH34> [brother] in his dispute. <WH7379>
"Keep <WH7368> far <WH7368> from a false <WH8267> charge, <WH1697> and do not kill <WH2026> the innocent <WH9345> or the righteous, <WH6662> for I will not acquit <WH6663> the guilty. <WH7563>
"And you shall not take <WH3947> a bribe, <WH7810> for a bribe <WH7810> blinds <WH5786> the clear-sighted and subverts <WH5557> the cause <WH1697> of the just. <WH6662>

"And you shall not oppress <WH3905> a stranger, <WH1616> since you yourselves <WH9043> know <WH3045> the feelings <WH5315> of a stranger, <WH1616> for you [also] were strangers <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
"And you shall sow <WH2232> your land <WH776> for six <WH8337> years <WH8141> and gather <WH622> in its yield, <WH8393>

but [on] the seventh <WH7637> year <WH7637> you shall let <WH8058> it rest <WH8058> and lie <WH5203> fallow, <WH5203> so that the needy <WH34> of your people <WH5971> may eat; <WH398> and whatever they leave <WH3499> the beast <WH9130> of the field <WH7704> may eat. <WH398> You are to do <WH6213> the same <WH3651> with your vineyard <WH3754> [and] your olive <WH2132> grove. <WH2132>

"Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> you are to do <WH6213> your work, <WH4639> but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> you shall cease <WH7673> [from labor] in order <WH4616> that your ox <WH7794> and your donkey <WH2543> may rest, <WH5117> and the son <WH1121> of your female <WH519> slave, <WH519> as well as your stranger, <WH1616> may refresh <WH5314> themselves.

"Now concerning everything <WH3605> which <WH834> I have said <WH559> to you, be on your guard; <WH8104> and do not mention <WH2142> the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> gods, <WH430> nor <WH3808> let [them] be heard <WH8085> from your mouth. <WH6310>
"Three <WH7969> times <WH7272> a year <WH8141> you shall celebrate <WH2287> a feast <WH2287> to Me.

"You shall observe <WH8104> the Feast <WH2282> of Unleavened <WH4682> Bread; <WH4682> for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you are to eat <WH398> unleavened <WH4682> bread, <WH4682> as I commanded <WH6680> you, at the appointed <WH4150> time <WH4150> in the month <WH2320> Abib, <WH24> for in it you came <WH3318> out of Egypt. <WH4714> And none <WH3808> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> Me empty-handed.

"Also [you shall observe] the Feast <WH2282> of the Harvest <WH7105> [of] the first <WH1061> fruits <WH1061> of your labors <WH4639> [from] what <WH834> you sow <WH2232> in the field; <WH7704> also the Feast <WH2282> of the Ingathering <WH614> at the end <WH3318> of the year <WH8141> when you gather <WH622> in [the fruit of] your labors <WH4639> from the field. <WH7704>
"Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> a year <WH8141> all <WH3605> your males <WH2138> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> God. <WH3068>

"You shall not offer <WH2076> the blood <WH1818> of My sacrifice <WH2077> with leavened <WH2557> bread; <WH2557> nor <WH3808> is the fat <WH2459> of My feast <WH2282> to remain <WH3885> overnight <WH3885> until <WH5704> morning. <WH1242>

"You shall bring <WH935> the choice <WH7225> first <WH1061> fruits <WH1061> of your soil <WH127> into the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430> You are not to boil <WH1310> a kid <WH1423> in the milk <WH2461> of its mother. <WH517>

"Behold, <WH2009> I am going to send <WH7971> an angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> you to guard <WH8104> you along the way, <WH1870> and to bring <WH935> you into the place <WH4725> which <WH834> I have prepared. <WH3559>

"Be on your guard <WH8104> before <WH4480> <WH6440> him and obey <WH8085> his voice; <WH6963> do not be rebellious <WH4784> toward him, for he will not pardon <WH5375> your transgression, <WH6588> since <WH3588> My name <WH8034> is in him.

"But if <WH518> you will truly <WH8085> obey <WH8085> his voice <WH6963> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> that I say, <WH1696> then I will be an enemy <WH340> to your enemies <WH340> and an adversary <WH9475> to your adversaries. <WH6887>

"For My angel <WH4397> will go <WH1980> before <WH6440> you and bring <WH935> you in to [the land of] the Amorites, <WH567> the Hittites, <WH2850> the Perizzites, <WH6522> the Canaanites, <WH3669> the Hivites <WH2340> and the Jebusites; <WH2983> and I will completely <WH3582> destroy <WH3582> them.

"You shall not worship <WH7812> their gods, <WH430> nor <WH3808> serve <WH5647> them, nor <WH3808> do <WH6213> according to their deeds; <WH4639> but you shall utterly <WH2040> overthrow <WH2040> them, and break <WH7665> their [sacred] pillars <WH4676> in pieces. <WH7665>

"But you shall serve <WH5647> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and He will bless <WH1288> your bread <WH3899> and your water; <WH4325> and I will remove <WH5493> sickness <WH9258> from your midst. <WH7130>
"There shall be no <WH3808> one miscarrying <WH7921> or barren <WH6135> in your land; <WH776> I will fulfill <WH4390> the number <WH4557> of your days. <WH3117>

"I will send <WH7971> My terror <WH367> ahead <WH6440> of you, and throw <WH2000> into confusion <WH2000> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> among whom <WH834> you come, <WH935> and I will make <WH5414> all <WH3605> your enemies <WH340> turn <WH5414> [their] backs <WH6203> to you.

"And I will send <WH7971> hornets <WH6880> ahead <WH6440> of you, that they may drive <WH1644> out the Hivites, <WH2340> the Canaanites, <WH3669> and the Hittites <WH2850> before <WH4480> <WH6440> you.

"I will not drive <WH1644> them out before <WH4480> you in a single <WH259> year, <WH8141> that the land <WH776> may not become <WH1961> desolate, <WH8077> and the beasts <WH9130> of the field <WH7704> become <WH7231> too <WH5921> numerous <WH7231> for you.

"I will drive <WH1644> them out before <WH4480> you little <WH4592> by little, <WH4592> until <WH5704> <WH834> you become <WH6509> fruitful <WH6509> and take <WH5157> possession <WH5157> of the land. <WH776>

"And I will fix <WH7896> your boundary <WH1366> from the Red <WH5488> <WH3220> Sea <WH3220> to the sea <WH3220> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and from the wilderness <WH4057> to the River <WH5104> [Euphrates;] for I will deliver <WH5414> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> into your hand, <WH3027> and you will drive <WH1644> them out before <WH4480> you.
"You shall make <WH3772> no <WH3808> covenant <WH1285> with them or with their gods. <WH430>

"They shall not live <WH3427> in your land, <WH776> lest <WH6435> they make you sin <WH2398> against Me; for [if] you serve <WH5647> their gods, <WH430> it will surely <WH3588> be a snare <WH4170> to you."
